title: COZSINOOR Queen Size Cooling Bed Pillows for Sleeping: Hotel Quality, Set of 2 - Down Alternative Microfiber Filled for Back, Stomach, Side Sleepers, Breathable, and Skin-Friendly

This set of 2 pillows provides the perfect balance of softness and support, ensuring a cloud-like sleeping experience without sacrificing shape. Wake up refreshed and say goodbye to neck pain and headaches!

Easy Care & Durability: Our pillows are machine washable and dryable, making them easy to care for. They always retain their new look, even after daily usage. Included in the set are two queen size pillows for your convenience.

Safe & Sound Sleep: Rest assured knowing that our COZSINOOR pillows are vacuum-packed for freshness. For the best experience, we recommend waiting 24 hours before using them. Enjoy a safe and sound sleep with our high-quality pillows.
